          <title>
            <string language="sl">Severna Amerika - trditve</string>
            <string language="en">North America - statements</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Nordamerika - Anweisungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Amérique du nord - rapports</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">America do Norte - indicações</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'America del Nord - istruzione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βόρεια Αμερική - δηλώσεις</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Norteamérica - declaraciones</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Ugotavljanje pravilnosti trditev povezanih s severno Ameriko.</string>
            <string language="en">Determining the correctness of statements related to the north Amerika.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">severna amerika</string>
            <string language="en">north america</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">trditev</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amerika</string>
            <string language="en">america</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Bestimmung der Korrektheit von Anweisungen 
stand auf dem Nordamerika in Verbindung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Déterminant l'exactitude des rapports liés à 
l'Amerika du nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Determinar a exatidão das indicações 
relacionou-se ao Amerika norte.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La determinazione della precisione delle 
istruzione si è riferita al Amerika del nord.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καθοριστικός την ακρίβεια των δηλώσεων σχετικών με το 
Βορρά Amerika.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Determinando la corrección de las declaraciones 
relacionadas con el Amerika del norte.</string>
          </description>
